sourcesContent:
Search Flights

For
Passengers

{{flight.airline}}

{{flight.arrival.time}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchResult: FlightRm[] = [ { airline: "American Airlines", arrival: {time: Date.now().toString(),place: "LA" }, departure: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Constantinople" }, price: "$350", remainingNumberOfSeats: 150, }, { airline: "Spanish Airlines", arrival: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Madrid" }, departure: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Bucharest" }, price: "$250", remainingNumberOfSeats: 50, }, { airline: "Lufthansa Airlines", arrival: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Munich" }, departure: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Rome" }, price: "$2500", remainingNumberOfSeats: 20, } ] ngOnInit(): void { } } export interface FlightRm { airline: string; arrival: TimePlaceRm; departure: TimePlaceRm; price: string; remainingNumberOfSeats: number; } export interface TimePlaceRm { place: string; time: string; }
